item.title: Projects
item.description: Personal Projects PaperWhiz - NLP-based recommender system Apr. - Jun. 2023, Python Github : https://github.com/yassine-rd/PaperWhiz Report : https://github.com/yassine-rd/PaperWhiz/blob/master/assets/pdf/report.pdf Web app : https://paperwhiz.streamlit.app/ In this project, I developed an NLP-based paper recommender system designed to recommend germane scientific papers tailored to a user’s specific interests. Papers are scraped from “cs.CV”, “stat.ML”, “cs.
